data.text: Zikusanze ggwe Alyeri29:1 Alyeri lye linnya eryaweebwa Yerusaalemi.,
Wabula ndizingiza Alyeri,
Ndikuba olusiisira okukwetooloola wonna,
Olikkakkanyizibwa era olyogera ng’oli mu ttaka,
Naye abalabe bo abangi
Amangwago mu kaseera katono Mukama Katonda ow’Eggye alikukyalira
Awo ebibinja by’amawanga gonna ebirwana ne Alyeri birimulumba,
ng’omuntu alumwa enjala bw’aloota ng’alya
Muwuniikirire era mwewuunye
Mukama akuwadde otulo tungi,

Okwolesebwa kuno kwonna tekulina makulu gy’oli okuggyako okuba ebigambo ebissibwako akabonero mu muzingo. Omuzingo bw’oguwa omuntu, asobola okusoma n’omugamba nti, “Nkwegayiridde kino kisome,” ajja kukuddamu nti, “Sisobola, kuliko akabonero.”
Oba omuzingo bw’oguwa omuntu atasobola kusoma, n’omugamba nti, “Nkwegayiridde kino kisome,” ajja kukuddamu nti, “Simanyi kusoma.”
Mukama agamba nti,
Noolwekyo, laba ŋŋenda kwewuunyisa abantu bano.
Zibasanze abo abakola kyonna kye basobola
Mufuula ebintu
Mu kiseera kitono, Lebanooni tekirifuulibwa nnimiro ngimu,
Mu biro ebyo abaggavu b’amatu baliwulira ebigambo by’omuzingo,
Abawombeefu balisanyukira mu Mukama nate,
Weewaawo asinga obubi aliggwaawo,
abo abakozesa ebigambo okufuula omuntu omusobya,
Noolwekyo Mukama eyanunula Ibulayimu bw’ati bw’ayogera eri ennyumba ya Yakobo nti,
Bwe baliraba omulimu gw’emikono gyange mu baana baabwe,
Abo abaabula mu mwoyo balifuna okutegeera,
